statements: UPDATE GeneticsData SET source_name='Source1', allele_frequency=0.25 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE GeneticsData SET chromosome='X', variant_type='SNP', position=1000 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE GeneticsData SET allele_frequency = 0.05 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GeneticsData SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', position = 5000 WHERE chromosome = '22';
UPDATE genes SET gene_name='GeneA', chromosome='Chr1', gene_type='Protein coding' WHERE gene_id=1;
UPDATE variations SET variation_name='Variation1', variation_type='SNP', gene_id=2 WHERE variation_id=3;
UPDATE genes SET gene_name = 'ABC', gene_type = 'Type1' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE variations SET variation_name = 'Variation1', variation_type = 'TypeA' WHERE variation_id = 2;
UPDATE SampleData SET sample_name = 'Updated Sample 1' WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SourceAData SET sourceA_info = 'Source A updated information' WHERE sourceA_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SampleData SET sample_name = 'New Sample Name' WHERE sample_id = 'c1288fb4-7aaa-4b4b-a3f6-86d9db971265';
UPDATE SourceAData SET sourceA_info = 'Updated Source A Info' FROM SourceAData sa JOIN SampleData sd ON sa.sample_id = sd.sample_id WHERE sd.sample_name = 'Some Sample Name';
UPDATE table1 SET column2 = 'New Value' WHERE column1 = 1;
UPDATE table3 SET column3 = 100.50 WHERE column2 = 'Example';
UPDATE table1 SET column2 = 'New Value1', column3 = 1000.50 WHERE column1 = 1;
UPDATE table4 SET column3 = 999.99, column2 = 'Updated Value' WHERE column1 = 4;
UPDATE gene_info SET gene_name = 'ABC' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE gene_annotations SET annotation_text = 'New annotation' WHERE annotation_id = 3;
UPDATE gene_info SET gene_name = 'Gene A', chromosome = 'X' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE gene_annotations SET annotation_text = 'New annotation', annotation_source = 'Database' WHERE gene_id = 2;
